ValidationRule.description: If GM4 is the version being sold, then the user must advise why and what is the migration plan to get them to GM5
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = "PGi Opportunity", $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", ISPICKVAL( GM_Version__c,"GM4"), ISBLANK( GM4_Why_Required__c), ISBLANK( GM5_Migration_Plan__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If you have sold GM4, you must advised why GM4 is required and what the GM5 migration plan is in the GlobalMeet Details section below.
